thread.title: Snapdeal to host Fashion Monday sale on October 26
thread.title_full: Snapdeal to host Fashion Monday sale on October 26

title: Snapdeal to host Fashion Monday sale on October 26
text:
Snapdeal to host Fashion Monday sale on October 26 
Times Of India Saturday 24th October, 2015 
NEW DELHI: Domestic e-commerce marketplace Snapdeal on Friday announced it will hold the Fashion Monday Sale on October 26, in a continuation of its series of category-focussed festive sales this year. "Snapdeal Fashion Monday sale will bring the widest assortment of fashion products to customers at attractive prices. Leading Indian and international brands will be available on the marketplace starting from midnight," said vice president, category management, Rahul Taneja....
